mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.hospital_id AS hospitalId,A.medication_type_id AS medicationTypeId,A.medication_id AS medicationId,A.name AS name,A.remain_num AS remainNum,A.warning_num AS warningNum,A.price AS price,A.serial AS serial,A.type_id AS typeId,A.link_id AS linkId,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.attr_decimal AS attrDecimal,A.main_ids AS mainIds,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.attr_num AS attrNum,A.attr_date AS attrDate,A.attr_datetime AS attrDatetime,A.sequence AS sequence,A.description AS description,A.remark AS remark,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy
,h.whole_name AS hospitalName, mt.name AS medicationTypeName, m.name AS medicationName, m.attention AS attention, m.usage_and_dosage AS usageAndDosage, m.unit AS unit
LEFT JOIN hospital h ON A.hospital_id = h.id LEFT JOIN medication_type mt ON A.medication_type_id = mt.id LEFT JOIN medication m ON A.medication_id = m.id

choose.when: SELECT IFNULL(remain_num, 0)-#{medicationNumber} from medication_repertory where hospital_id=#{hospitalId} and medication_id=#{medicationId};
choose.otherwise: SELECT IFNULL(remain_num, 0) from medication_repertory where hospital_id=#{hospitalId} and medication_id=#{medicationId};

mapper.update: UPDATE medication_repertory SET remain_num = remain_num - #{consumeNum}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
